role.argrole: entity arg0 doesn't have/doesn't exit for arg0

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (DNP (NP (PN 他)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 理论))) (VP (ADVP (AD 或许)) (ADVP (AD 并)) (VP (VE 无) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 独特))) (DEC 之))) (NP (NN 处))))))

role.argrole: thing that does not exist in this domain
